lender.name: Ben Bickford
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about unity and believe that we all have the power and responsibility to transform our world and support those in need. Efficient, collaborative technology such as Kiva.org runs as a social business model ensuring that 100% of the pooled contributions are made available for micro finance loans which is the most efficient way to redistribute under utilised resources like money to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves creating innovative strategies and integrated solutions to empower organisations with technology - aligning information, people, cultures and processes using collaborative technology for sustainable advantage.

lender.name: Kristine Creely
lender.loan_because:
The starfish story really captures the reason why I loan:
Once a man was walking along a beach. The sun was shining and it was a beautiful day. Off in the distance he could see a person going back and forth between the surf's edge and and the beach. Back and forth this person went. As the man approached he could see that there were hundreds of starfish stranded on the sand as the result of the natural action of the tide.
The man was stuck by the the apparent futility of the task. There were far too many starfish. Many of them were sure to perish. As he approached the person continued the task of picking up starfish one by one and throwing them into the surf.
As he came up to the person he said, "You must be crazy. There are thousands of miles of beach covered with starfish. You can't possibly make a difference." The person looked at the man. He then stooped down and pick up one more starfish and threw it back into the ocean. He turned back to the man and said, "It sure made a difference to that one!".
Loaning makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get from where they are right now to where they want to be ... I help people make their dreams come true.

lender.name: ross
lender.loan_because:
I loaned money through kiva loans because I feel that i am actively helping someone on the other side of the world.
The money I loaned was raised through my website with the kind help of many of the forum members :)
lender.occupational_info: I work for an IT company in Edinburgh looking after large corporate websites.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: its good Karma.
lender.occupational_info: student.

lender.name: Koos
lender.loan_because: Thank You my Lord to be able to do. It's all Your money.

lender.name: Jane and Tom
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference and Kiva makes it possible.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I hope my investment will help being about sustainable and appropriate economic development for those in need. Kiva appeals to me because it is individuals deciding what will help them improve their own well being.
lender.occupational_info: I develop computer systems for the film and television industry.

lender.name: Chlo
lender.loan_because: i have more than i need and can help with what i have.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: This is a way that almost anyone can feel that specific glow that comes from assisting someone to pull themselves up. I love that it's a loan, not a gift -- nothing wrong with a gift, of course; but a loan does seem healthier in many ways. I love Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell land and homes, here in the beautiful high desert/mountains of New Mexico. I am especially interested in energy-efficient homes and the people who believe in them.

lender.name: calinasmaria
lender.loan_because: with a little act, we can help to change the world and make it a better place. Peace and happiness to all!

lender.name: Nicolas
lender.occupational_info: I work for La colombe Torrefaction, a coffee company located in Philadelphia PA. In spite of my Irish last name I am from France and I live in New York; There, I am in charge of the brand development and market prospection for my company. 15 years ago I met the 2 founders of La Colombe and like their entrepreneurship spirit...our company is now very successful and has become one of the best coffee company of North America

lender.name: Hillary
lender.loan_because: I've been to Cambodia and seen what the money will be going towards. I really believe that if we all help a little it will make a huge difference.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home to take care of my child.

lender.name: Joo Pedro
lender.loan_because: I aim for a world of equal opportunities.

lender.name: Shin
lender.loan_because: I'm sure that my loans help someone who produces something and moves the world forwards, definitely not backwards, although it's one small step. Thank you, Kiva and entrepreneurs. You give meanings to my money.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed and want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Manager at manufacturing plant.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: People helped me get started and now I can help others
lender.occupational_info: I manage a computer system

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: Its a successful technique used in several developing countries. It teaches young entrepreneurs how to sustain their business through micro loans. What better way to support them.
lender.occupational_info: Learning and applying my knowledge to writing papers and various projects. Same pattern persists for many months.

lender.name: Whitney & James
lender.loan_because: We have been given so much throughout our lifetime. This is a chance for us to give back, and to give back to those who need it. Kiva.org is a great way to see your donation go to work.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: the returns are better when I invest in people than when I invest in the bank!

lender.name: Michal
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Help a man buying a fishing net and you feed him for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I earn money using tools which others gave me for free.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I am able
lender.occupational_info: I help companies implement new business software.

lender.name: Emerson & Sarah
lender.loan_because: We want to see the world become a better place...
lender.occupational_info: We both work to make the world smile.Sarah manages a dental office & Emerson is a songwriter/producer/guitar player-visit him at www.thetraxmasters.com

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a well respected site.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I help people work through their legal problems.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I believe people can do many great things if given a chance.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have a graphic design and corporate merchandise company. We also do web design.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: helping others is what we're all here for!

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I believe that everybody should have a fair chance in life. There are so many good people in the world who just need a 'break' to get themselves established and to provide for their families. Here in the USA, and other developed countries, those 'breaks' are plentiful and a reason why the people here and other developed countries should give to those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the largest Direct Response (Infomercial) company in the USA.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: If the world is not a better place for my having been here, I am just taking up space.
lender.occupational_info: I work with infants and children to age three who have disabilities and are behind in doing things normal children their age can do. I teach their parents how to help them. I also work with elderly who are very ill and cannot take care of themselves. I help them gain strength and learn to do skills they lost when they became ill.

lender.name: Carey
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help someone help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make custom jewelry and soap party favors.

lender.name: Claude
lender.loan_because: We're a small planet and a big village, aren't we?
lender.occupational_info: I'm taking care of my husband (91) and my mom (82) who's "hospitalized at home". I'm learning webdesign so I hope to be able to work as long as I can.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: a woman of dignity who is helping her husband wih the work of her hands is worthy of help
lender.occupational_info: I was a para legal in a law firm for 25 years am now retired and volunteer in the food panty, library and office of our church

lender.name: G & S
lender.loan_because: To honor the kind and generous spirit of my mother and father.
lender.occupational_info: I have great respect for entrepreneurs willing to create a business and work hard for their livelihood.

lender.name: Joanne and Doug
lender.loan_because: We care.

lender.name: Robert E
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am an International Business and Religious Studies Major. I am learning to love God and love others and then teach others how to do the same.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: A single act of kindness can change the world

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better their situation.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites.

lender.name: suzanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help others become self supportive and take care of their families.

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: I feel a connection to people around the world who are struggling in their daily lives.
lender.occupational_info: I find resources for people who are hospitalized.

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: I think it is Good.
lender.occupational_info: I'm going to school to learn how to draw and write. I want to be able to tell stories about what I believe.

lender.name: Dill Pickle Designs,Inc.
lender.loan_because: Just as I began my journey and dream of building my own company I saw a television special on Kiva. I decided then and there that Kiva would be the organization our Company would support. Building dreams and taking risks together across the globe unites our Company with women and men making lives better for themselves and their families. There is no higher honour than helping those who have greater struggles.
lender.occupational_info: sleep masks and sleepwear

lender.name: nancy
lender.loan_because: I was intorduced to it by a tv personality and was at first concerned about over the internet payment. I have since gotten over the concern and feel this is a way to help the local. If the person is sincere I hope that his dream is everything he hoped it would be. good luck and with love Nancy
lender.occupational_info: I take care of sick people, all ages and with all kinds of problems.

lender.name: Jena
lender.loan_because: I love supporting people that are working hard to making their lives better. And if I were born in the third world, I could be the person asking for the loan and not the lender.

lender.name: deviantmonk
lender.loan_because: I want to help others build better lives for themselves and their families and also because I want God's love to work through me.
lender.occupational_info: I create art and videos on my computer.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I think every little bit makes a difference!

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: I feel this is something I can do for someone far away. I have always wanted to help others. This is a great way to do so. I'm so happy to contribute to a greater good...
lender.occupational_info: I am a Neonatal Nurse. I work in a Hospital and take care of very small babies born too early. It is a very exciting job and I love what I do very much!

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: Micro loans help small business owners. The payback of loans is excellent.

lender.name: Patrick McKeough
lender.occupational_info: My company, The Successful Investor Inc., publishes information and opinions that help people decide how to invest their savings. We also manage investments for people who prefer to have us make the investment decisions for them.
